description: Bag decorated with many keychains, badges, plushies of favorite character.

examples.chinese: 上学路上遇到带痛包盆友
examples.translation: Met a friend with an Itabag on the way to school

examples.chinese: 有没有适合装娃娃的痛包推荐一下
examples.translation: Any recommendations for an Itabag suitable for plushies?

examples.chinese: 买滴谷子超萌！于是快速做成痛包了
examples.translation: Bought super cute goods! Quickly made an Itabag
